Song.title: O God, Our Help In Ages Past
Song.copyright: Original words by Isaac Watts Alt. words, chorus & music by Mark Altrogge © 2004 Sovereign Grace Praise
Song.amazon_links: [{"asin":"B000ZJKY5W","title":"O God, Our Help in Ages Past","artist":"Sovereign Grace Music","image_url":"http:\/\/ecx.images-amazon.com\/images\/I\/51CotfwF8BL._SL75_.jpg"}]

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [D | D | D | D]
Verse 1: O [D]God, our help in [G]ages past, our [Bm]hope for years to [F#m]come Our [Em]shelter from the [G]stormy blast, and [G]our e[A]ternal [Bm]home
Verse 2: Un[D]der the shadow [G]of Your throne, Your [Bm]saints have dwelt se[F#m]cure Suf[Em]ficient is Your [G]arm alone, and [G]our de[A]fense is [Bm]sure And [G]our de[A]fense is [D]sure
Chorus: Lord, [D - Em - D/F# -]You{,} [ ]have [A]been my dwelling [D]place In [G]every gener[Bm]ation, You’re our [A A/G | A/F# A/E]King Lord, [D - Em - D/F# -]You{,} [ ]have [A]crowned our lives with [D]grace Our [G]humble ador[Bm]ation we will [A A/G | A/F# A/E]bring And we [Em7]sing to You, we [Cmaj9]sing to You [G] [ ]Beneath the [Gm]shelter of Your [D | A | Em | G | D | A | Em | G]wings
Verse 3: Be[D]fore the towering [G]mountains stood ‘Fore the [Bm]oceans, fields, and [F#m]plains From [Em]everlasting, [G]You are God To [G]endless [A]years the [Bm]same
Verse 4: Oh, a [D]thousand ages [G]in Your sight Are a [Bm]fleeting moment [F#m]gone One [Em]day is like a [G]thousand years To [G]You, E[A]ternal [Bm]One To [G]You, E[A]ternal [D]One
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 o god our help in ages past our hope for years to come our shelter from the stormy blast and our eternal home verse 2 under the shadow of your throne your saints have dwelt secure sufficient is your arm alone and our defense is sure and our defense is sure chorus lord you have been my dwelling place in every generation youre our king lord you have crowned our lives with grace our humble adoration we will bring and we sing to you we sing to you beneath the shelter of your wings verse 3 before the towering mountains stood fore the oceans fields and plains from everlasting you are god to endless years the same verse 4 oh a thousand ages in your sight are a fleeting moment gone one day is like a thousand years to you eternal one to you eternal one
